fields.name: Senior Unsecured
fields.description: Standard senior debt instruments without security.

fields.name: Covered
fields.description: Senior debt instrument secured primarily with mortgage loans or other tangible assets that remain on the balance sheet of the issuer.

fields.name: Additional Tier 1
fields.description: Junior subordinated capital instrument issued primarily by financial institutions as an equity-like complement to their capital base.

fields.name: Subordinated
fields.description: Subordinated capital instruments issued primarily by financial institutions as a complement to their capital base.

fields.name: Senior non-preferred
fields.description: Senior debt instruments that are junior to senior unsecured debt and senior to Tier 2 subordinated capital instruments.
